policy.title: About us
policy.subtitle: Welcome to VoteVibe.club (‚Äúwe‚Äù). This policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect personal data when you visit the website and take quizzes.

cards.title: 1. Data We Collect
cards.body:
Data we collect
Data provided by you: email, nickname (if any), topic preferences; quiz responses (for entertainment purposes, not for making legal decisions).

We do not ask for sensitive information (financial, identity documents)."

cards.title: 2. Purpose of Use
cards.body:
Operating and improving the website/quiz. Aggregated/anonymous analytics to understand popular content.
Sending emails/content you agreed to receive (may include affiliate links for users 20+).

Security, fraud prevention, technical logging."

cards.title: 3. Cookies & Similar Technologies
cards.body:
Essential (always on): navigation, security, language recognition.

Preferences/Analytics/Marketing: only activated with your consent in the Consent Center.

cards.title: 4. Sharing of Data
cards.body:
Service providers processing on our behalf (hosting, CDN, email, analytics).
Authorities where required by law.
Do not sell personal data.

cards.title: 5. Storage & Location
cards.body:
Data may be stored on servers located outside of Vietnam (e.g., Singapore).

Term: email until you unsubscribe or up to 24 months of inactivity; technical logs 12 months; aggregated data may be kept longer.

cards.title: 6. Your Rights
cards.body:
You can request: access, correction, deletion of data; withdrawal of consent; complaint. Contact privacy@votevibe.club
‚Äî we will respond within 30 days.

cards.title: 7. Minors
cards.body: Services are for users 20+. If you are under 20, please do not submit personal data.

cards.title: 8. Security
cards.body: Transport encryption (HTTPS), access control, data minimization. No method is absolutely secure; we are always improving.

cards.title: 9. Policy Changes
cards.body: May be updated over time. ‚ÄúLast updated‚Äù: 31/10/2025. New versions will be posted on this page.

banner.title: Have fun first, everything else later!
banner.subtitle: 30s quiz zone ‚Äî laugh, ‚Äúwow,‚Äù share with friends. Pick a topic and start now!

about.title: About Us...
about.subtitle:
The world is complicated. Situations where you need to say ‚Äúnot today, please‚Äù come up more often than discount notifications. Stress hides in deadlines, chats, and endless ‚Äúcall me back in five minutes.‚Äù \n
 VoteVibe is a little ‚Äúpause‚Äù button: a place where short quizzes bring back your smile and help you feel lighter right now.
VoteVibe is like a small ‚Äúpause‚Äù button: here, short quizzes can bring back your smile and help you feel a bit lighter right now.

tabs.label: What do we do?
tabs.title: What do we do?
tabs.body:
üéØ We collect quizzes that take a couple of minutes to complete ‚Äî and give you that ‚Äúoh yes, that's me‚Äù feeling.
üòÇ We throw in some friendly humor without any toxicity: funny ‚Äî yes, offensive ‚Äî no.
üß† We give your brain a ‚Äúbreak‚Äù: a little bit of play, and the day already feels brighter.

tabs.label: Why It Works
tabs.title: Why It Works
tabs.body:
Micro-dopamine > micro-stress: a quick win ‚Äî and your mood improves.

A little self-irony ‚Äî and problems become less burdensome.

Smiles are contagious: you shared them, and now you and your people feel better.

tabs.label: What we believe in
tabs.title: What we believe in
tabs.body:
Joy is a skill that can be practiced every day.

Humor heals better when it doesn't hurt anyone.

Little ‚Äúwows‚Äù add up to a big ‚Äúeverything's okay.‚Äù

Come in for a couple of minutes, choose a topic that suits your mood, and let the quizzes make your day easier.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Here you can manage the website's cookies and non-essential data processing. Essential items are always enabled to ensure the site operates securely.

faq.question: What data do we collect at minimum?
faq.answer: Email (only when you voluntarily register), quiz answers (non-sensitive information), technical data (cookies/device info) ‚Äî used to operate the site and improve experience

faq.question: How can I manage my data?
faq.answer: You can submit a request at votevibe.club ‚Äì feedback to: withdraw consent / obtain a copy of your personal data / request data deletion

faq.question: Where is the data stored and for how long?
faq.answer: Data may be stored on servers outside Vietnam (e.g., Singapore). Email: kept until you unsubscribe, or up to 24 months of inactivity. Technical logs: kept for 12 months.

faq.question: Who is the service for? Do we sell data?
faq.answer: The service is for users aged 20 and above. We do not sell personal data.

faq.question: What rights do I have regarding my personal data?
faq.answer: You can request: access, correction, deletion of data / withdraw consent / file a complaint. Contact us via votevibe.club ‚Äì feedback; we will respond within 30 days.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Here you can manage the website's cookies and non-essential data processing purposes. Essential items will always remain enabled to ensure the secure operation of the site.

collapse.title: Current Status:
collapse.body: Essential: Always On  Preferences: [On/Off]  Analytics: [On/Off]  Marketing: [On/Off]

collapse.title: Essential Items:
collapse.body: Responsible for navigation, security, load balancing, language memory, and other core website functions. These types of cookies cannot be disabled. Preferences: Used to remember your choices (such as interface language, display mode, etc.).

collapse.title: Analytics:
collapse.body: Used to measure overall usage behavior and improve content. Without your permission, we will not create personalized analytics or profiles.

collapse.title: Marketing:
collapse.body: Used to measure campaign effectiveness and recommend partner content (general level only). Without your consent, we will not track you across sites.

collapse.title: Your Choices:
collapse.body: Accept All / Allow Only Essential / Save Preferences. You can change your choices at any time on this page. When you select 'Allow Only Essential', all non-essential cookies will be disabled or deleted where feasible.

collapse.title: Transparency:
collapse.body: List of providers (e.g., hosting/CDN, analytics tools, email services). Details may be updated over time. For any questions, feel free to contact: privacy@votevibe.club
